alert.note: Alert for Harrison (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 19 at 5:26PM CST until January 19 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CST FOR WEST CENTRAL CADDO PARISH IN NORTHWESTERN LOUISIANA AND EAST CENTRAL HARRISON COUNTIES... At 525 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Waskom, or 14 miles east of Marshall, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Greenwood, Blanchard, Waskom, Jonesville, Cross Lake, Bethany and Leigh. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
